name: 恋鐘
text: ふぁ～、人のすごか～！
trans: Aah, there's so many people!

name: 咲耶
text: ああ、本当だ
trans: Yeah, you're right.

name: 咲耶
text:
丁度帰宅ラッシュの時間に
ぶつかってしまったようだね
trans: Looks like we stumbled upon the rush hour.

name: 恋鐘
text:
咲耶、迷子になったらいけんよ
ちゃ～んとついてきとる？
trans:
Sakuya, you shouldn't get lost here.
Be sure to stick close to me, okay?

name: 咲耶
text: 大丈夫、心配ないよ
trans: It's okay. You don't have to worry about that.

name: 咲耶
text:
恋鐘も、人混みに流されてるうちに
知らない道にいた、なんてならないようにね
trans: You too, Kogane. Don't get lost in the crowd and then finding yourself in a place you have no idea where.

name: 恋鐘
text:
そがんことにはならんよ！
うち、このへんの道やったらプロフェッショナルやけん
trans: That won't happen! I'm a pro when it comes to these streets!

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ、
それは頼もしいね
trans: Heh, you sure sound confident about that.

name: 咲耶
text:
それなら……私の手を引いて、
事務所まで導いてくれると嬉しいな
trans: In that case, it'd make me happy if you take my hand and guide me to our office.

name: 恋鐘
text:
か～っ！　子どもみたいなことば言って！
冗談ばっかりやと、ほんとに迷子になるけんね！
trans:
You're talking to me like I'm a kid!
If you keep joking like that, you'll really get lost!

name: 恋鐘
text: ──あ、咲耶。青信号……
trans: Look, Sakuya. It says "go" now...

name: 恋鐘
text:
あ、あれ～？　咲耶！？
どこ行ったと～！？
trans:
H-Huh? Sakuya!?
Where did ya go!?

name: 恋鐘
text: 咲耶ぁ～？
trans: Sakuya?

name: 恋鐘
text: 咲耶ぁ～……？
trans: Sakuya...?

name: 恋鐘
text: やっぱり手、繋いどったほうがよかったとかな……
trans: I guess I really should've held her hand...

name: 恋鐘
trans: Saku...

name: 恋鐘
text: ──あっ
trans: Ah!

name: 恋鐘
text: この間撮った、CMばい……
trans: It's the commercial we did last time!

name: 恋鐘
text: 咲耶の映っとる……！
trans: Sakuya's on screen now!

name: 恋鐘
text: ふぁ～……
trans: Aah...

name: 恋鐘
text: すごか……
trans: Woah...

name: 恋鐘
text:
ほんとに……
あがんおっきかテレビに、うちら……──
trans: We're really being shown on that big screen──

name: 咲耶
text: ──恋鐘
trans: ...Kogane.

name: 咲耶
text: 恋鐘、大丈夫かい？
trans: Kogane, are you alright?

name: 恋鐘
text: ……はっ！
trans: Haa!?

name: 恋鐘
text: 咲耶ぁ～！　おった～！
trans: Sakuya! There you are!

name: 恋鐘
text:
やっと見つかったばい……
どこ行っとったと～！？
trans: I finally found ya... Where did ya even go~!?

name: 咲耶
text:
ずっとすぐ後ろにいたのだけど……
ああ、気づいていなかったんだね
trans:
I was just right behind you all this time.
Oh, I see that you didn't see me.

name: 恋鐘
trans: Eh~!?

name: 咲耶
text:
恋鐘があのビジョンに魅入られていたからね
つい、声をかけるのを躊躇ってしまったよ
trans:
You were so caught up on that screen
so I hesitated to call out to you.

name: 恋鐘
text:
も～！
びっくりするけん、驚かさんとって！
trans:
Come on~!
Don't startle me like that!

name: 恋鐘
text:
咲耶おらん～って思っとったら
あそこのテレビに咲耶の映っとるけん
trans:
Right after I realized that you were gone,
You were shown on that TV.

name: 恋鐘
text:
うち、咲耶があん中に
吸い込まれたかと思ったばい……！
trans:
I thought that you
sucked inside that!

name: 咲耶
text:
……ああ、バレてしまったか
実は少しあの中にお邪魔してきたんだ
trans:
...Oh, you saw through me.
Actually, I just dropped in there for a while.

name: 咲耶
text: 私の姿、楽しんでくれたかな？
trans: Did you enjoy watching me?

name: 恋鐘
trans: E-Eh!?

name: 咲耶
text: なんてね……冗談だよ
trans: Psyche. I was just kidding.

name: 恋鐘
text: だ……騙したと……？
trans: Y-You tricked me?

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ、ごめんね
ピュアなことを言う恋鐘が可愛くて、つい……ね
trans: Heh, sorry about that. You always say the darnedest things and are so cute, that I couldn't help myself.

name: 恋鐘
text:
……テレビの中やとかっこよかやけど
本物はいじわるばい……！
trans:
The one on the TV was so cool
But the real one is a big meanie!

name: 咲耶
text:
それなら私もあの映像を見ていて思ったよ
普段の恋鐘は可愛らしいけれど……
trans:
I had the same thought when I saw that.
Normally, you're such a cute thing, Kogane

name: 咲耶
text:
ビジョンに映る恋鐘は、美しい……と、
そう形容したくなる姿をしていたんだ
trans: But the you shown on the screen is, well, makes me want you to describe as beautiful.

name: 恋鐘
text:
な、なんば言いよっと……
今日は冗談ばっかりばい～……
trans:
Huh... W-What are you talking about?
You sure are full of jokes today.

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ、私は思ったことを
口にしたまでだよ
trans: Heh, I was just saying what's on my mind.

name: 咲耶
text:
──さあ、そろそろ行こうか
いつまでもここに立っていたら邪魔になってしまうよ
trans:
Well, we better get going.
We'll just be in the way if we keep standing here.

name: 恋鐘
text: そうやった！　はよ帰らんば！
trans: Right! We better hurry back!

name: 咲耶
text:
……そうだ。今度こそ、私の手を取ってくれないかい？
恋鐘がまた、ビジョンに映る私たちに囚われたら大変だ
trans: I know. How about you take my hand this time? We're going to be in deep trouble if you get taken in again by the L'Antica on that screen.

name: 恋鐘
text:
んふふ～！
そがん繋ぎたかとやったら繋いで帰っちゃるばい～！
trans: Mhehe! If you want to hold hands that much, then let's do it as we head back!

name: 恋鐘
text: 『美しか』うちがね～！
trans: The "beautiful" us that is!
